remarks: The ` M ` -th derivative of the Taylor polynomial is the Taylor polynomial of the ` M ` -th derivative of the function.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Jan-2017.)
statement:
dvntaylp.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. { RR , CC } ) $.
dvntaylp.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> CC ) $.
dvntaylp.a $e |- ( ph -> A C_ S ) $.
dvntaylp.m $e |- ( ph -> M e. NN0 ) $.
dvntaylp.n $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN0 ) $.
dvntaylp.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. dom ( ( S Dn F ) ` ( N + M ) ) ) $.
dvntaylp $p |- ( ph -> ( ( CC Dn ( ( N + M ) ( S Tayl F ) B ) ) ` M ) = ( N ( S Tayl ( ( S Dn F ) ` M ) ) B ) ) $.
